admin.nothing_here_yet: You did not create any badges or categories yet.

confirm_messages.delete_badge: Are you sure you want to remove this badge? It is removed from all users and is irreversible.
confirm_messages.delete_category: Are you sure you want to remove this category? If there are any badges in this category, they will be marked as 'uncategorized'.

badge.name: Badge name
badge.visible_description: Enable this badge. When disabled, the badge will not be visible.

badge_category.name: Category name
badge_category.enabled_description: Enable this category. When disabled, all badges will be disabled and the category will be hidden.

not_installed.title: Automatically reward users with badges
not_installed.content: This extension offers more functionality when Auto Moderator is installed and activated. When you install this extension, users can be automatically rewarded with badges without the intervention of a community employee!

forum.user_has_badge: The user already has this badge.
forum.user_no_badges: This user does not have any badges yet.

badge.name: Badge name
badge.earned_count: {count, plural, one {# user has earned this badge} other {# users have earned this badge}}

moderation.remove_badge_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this badge from this user?
